channel.title: Donater How do i make people it>?<
channel.description: My Friend Donated 50$ to keep server up and i need to know how to make him donator

item.title: Donater How do i make people it>?<
item.dc:creator: @gooasco gooasco
item.description:
@gooasco wrote:

1 youlll need a server that has the donator characte funcion
2 go to data/config folder and look for a text file that is " donor.txt " add his name to it then go to the character folder and open his user file (in a .txt file) and look for the sentance like this donator = 0
make the 0 a 1 and have him log in(he needs to be logged out in the process)
then he should have the rank

Read full topic
item.source: Donater How do i make people it>?<
